name: Metadata_updater
description: A script to update meta-data of data used in the MICCAI challenges organized by FLI-IAM

inputs.name: Input file
inputs.description: A JSON file containing meta-data associated with the data processed by the pipeline. Content of this file will be copied to the output metadata.

inputs.name: Challenger email
inputs.description: Email of the challenger who runs the pipeline. Will be added to output meta-data.

inputs.name: Pipeline name
inputs.description: Name of the pipeline. Will be added to output meta-data.

inputs.name: Team name
inputs.description: Name of the challenger's team. Will be added to output meta-data.

output-files.name: Output file
output-files.description: Output file containing execution-specific meta-data and input meta-data
